pros: Excellent Campus and Extremely Good For Studying and Education including High Culture & Values.
cons: I didn't find any cons while doing job at Arya College of Engineering & IT, Jaipur.

review_title: ACEIT- Arya College Something... There are cluster of college from same family with same name , which is confusing
pros:
Better than garbage available In Jaipur, but having said that, it does not make it cleaner.
They gave a bonus on Diwali, which makes a pretty decent amount for one.
Having studied in the finest institutes and now working in the institute of national importance comparatively I do not have anything to mention about "pros."
cons:
- I stayed in the hostel of the institute which was decent but the food was pathetic not at all nutritious and the milk was heavily adulterated with water. And just imagine the students eats that garbage despite paying for it.
- No career progression, they want educated laborers, they even recruit freshers from their own institute as Lecturer.
- The owner some Agarwal is very fond of fashion shows and loves doing catwalks in almost every event of the college...LOL
- Library is in a pathetic state too, I never saw any studying or visiting Library. 
- They opened some engineering branches but they do not possess even a sufficient state of the art for running the branch.
- They confiscate the original documents of their employees, maybe of students as well, and even deduct a month's salary as the security deposit, which is refundable when they leave, but mostly they deduct a certain proportion from it on the pretext of one or the other.

Situated far from the city.
Want educated cheap labours

pros: There are lots of learning opportunities, lots of research work and lots of challenges. We always keep on exploring new things and opportunities..
cons: There are no downsides but just the challenges which are met by proper coordination between the team members and the management.

pros: Everything is good except the hostel rooms, these are very pathetic.
cons: Hostel rooms are pathetic and no AC in classrooms

pros: It is one of reputed group in Jaipur city in education
cons: Hired and fired policy is adoped.
Needs more hierarchal transparency from the management to the lower levels.

pros: Good environment as well and faculties are supportive
Not much. However placement drives are good. Take responsibilities in them to make your experience fruitful
cons: Too much stress. Students are not good. To compensate that, they make you work very hard. stressful env
